name: Fireball
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
description: A bright streak flashes to a point you choose and blossoms into an explosion of flame (8d6 fire damage)

name: Cure Wounds
description: Heal a creature you touch for 1d8 + spellcasting modifier HP

name: Magic Missile
description: Create three darts of magical force that automatically hit (1d4+1 force damage each)
